```{r histogrambpsys, fig.cap="Change in Systolic blood pressure between first two visits"}
ggplot(pdata_change, aes(shf_bpsys_diff)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, col = global_kicols[1]) +
  theme_minimal() +
  xlab("Change in systolic blood pressure") +
  ylab("Count")
```
